trmythos.skill.omniscient_eye.descriptio: See all, comprehend all, able to peer into the souls of others and mimic that which makes up their being.
trmythos.skill.faker.projection.empty_ha: The target has nothing to forge...
trmythos.skill.faker.projection.fail.tsu: This weapon rejects you, even as a replica...
trmythos.skill.faker.projection.fail.res: This artifact is not one that can be so easily replicated...
trmythos.race.lesser_serpent.notes:
You emerge in the world as a lowly, fragile serpent. Your scales provide some protection, but not enough to stave off most, if not all that inhabits this land. 
 You know you can be so much more, so will you wallow in the dirt forever, or live up to your potential?
trmythos.race.canine.notes: A simple hound free to roam the land, eating, sleeping, and playing as freely as you please. Or as the world will allow.
trmythos.race.maiden.notes: A humble spirit of heaven, brought in by the Valkyries as a warrior long ago, now intent on carrying out the same duty.
